definition: to overtake/to catch up with/to hurry/to rush/to try to catch (the bus etc)/to drive (cattle etc) forward/to drive (sb) away/to avail oneself of (an opportunity)/until

sentences.english: His smile spread out to his cars again, and he headed for the checkouts .
sentences.chinese: 他又咧开嘴笑了，赶快奔向收款台。

sentences.english: He hurried behind the other Blue Team members to get aboard their own transport.
sentences.chinese: 他也赶快紧随其他蓝队成员登上他们自己的飞行器。

sentences.english: Little red hat hurried to put a big stone into the wolf's belly.
sentences.chinese: 小红帽赶快去找来大石头填到狼的肚子里去。

sentences.english: So everyone's freaking out. And insisting I go get vaccinated.
sentences.chinese: 所以这把所有人都吓坏了，他们都让我赶快去打疫苗。

sentences.english: Yeah. I can't wait to get some fresh feta cheese.
sentences.chinese: 对啊，我好想赶快吃到新鲜的羊乳酪。

sentences.english: They were runing from the police like all get-out .
sentences.chinese: 孩子们一看见警察就赶快溜走了。

sentences.english: Please hurry up the dispatch of these telegrams.
sentences.chinese: 请赶快将这些电报发出去。

sentences.english: We must return to Solace quickly.
sentences.chinese: 我们得赶快回到索拉斯。

sentences.english: I would rather you posted this letter right away.
sentences.chinese: 我倒希望你把这封信赶快寄走。

sentences.english: Hurry up, or you'll miss the early bus.
sentences.chinese: 赶快，否则你就赶不上早班车。

sentences.english: Run for the doctor,the old man is dying.
sentences.chinese: 这个老头儿不行了，赶快去找医生。

sentences.english: We quickly pulled the moon Come.
sentences.chinese: 我们赶快把月亮捞上来吧。

sentences.english: You’ll be late unless you hurry.
sentences.chinese: 你会迟到的，如果不赶快的话。

sentences.english: I think you have to prepare for his funeral.
sentences.chinese: 我看你赶快准备后事吧。

sentences.english: But, uh, we better get home before our families wake up.
sentences.chinese: 不过我们最好趁着家人还没醒赶快回去。

definition: to do sth more quickly/Hurry up!/Get a move on!
at once/right away/immediately/on horseback (i.e. by military force)
to snatch time/to rush/to hurry (up)/to seize the moment
erhua variant of 快點|快点[kuai4 dian3]
(modal particle indicating suggestion or surmise)/...right?/...OK?/...I presume.
bar (loanword) (serving drinks, or providing Internet access etc)/to puff (on a pipe etc)/(onom.) bang/abbr. for 貼吧|贴吧[tie1 ba1]
sentence-final particle that conveys informality, warmth, friendliness or intimacy/may also indicate that one is stating a fact that the other person is not aware of
oh (interjection indicating that one has just learned sth)
(final particle equivalent to 了[le5])/(particle calling attention to, or mildly warning of, a situation)
to chant/see 梵唄|梵呗[fan4 bai4]
modal particle indicating indicating lack of enthusiasm/modal particle indicating that things should only or can only be done a certain way
(final particle similar to 了[le5], indicating that sth is obvious)
